Generation III.Ruby: Latios has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This Pok é mon is intelligent and understands human speech.
Generation III.Sapphire: Latios will only open its heart to a Trainer with a compassionate spirit. This Pok é mon can fly faster than a jet plane by folding its forelegs to minimize air resistance.
Generation III.Emerald: Even in hiding, it can detect the locations of others and sense their emotions since it has telepathy. Its intelligence allows it to understand human languages.
